code: class  Solution  {   public :   bool  canBeIncreasing ( vector < int >&  nums )  {   bool  removed  =  false ;   for  ( int  i  =  1 ;  i  <  nums . size ();  ++ i )   if  ( nums [ i  -  1 ]  >=  nums [ i ])  {   if  ( removed )   return  false ;   removed  =  true ;    if  ( i  >  1  &&  nums [ i  -  2 ]  >=  nums [ i ])   nums [ i ]  =  nums [ i  -  1 ];    }   return  true ;   }  };
